headlines.description: AS Roma suffered their first defeat of the Serie A season as Atalanta stunned the capital side with a 2-0 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Atalanta hand Roma first league loss of season

headlines.description: Inter Milan continued their perfect start to the Serie A season and returned to the top of the table with a 1-0 win over Lazio at San Siro.
headlines.shortLinkText: Inter beat Lazio to stay perfect atop Serie A

headlines.description: Cagliari secured a smash-and-grab 1-0 win away to Napoli on Wednesday thanks to a late goal from substitute Lucas Castro.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cagliari snatch late shock win away to Napoli
